dcterms:description: A dataset for language identification in code-switched data, specifically Nepali-English, collected from Twitter and introduced at the CALCS 2014 workshop.

dcterms:description: A dataset for language identification in code-switched data, specifically Spanish-English, collected from Twitter and introduced at the CALCS 2016 workshop.
dcterms:title: Spanish-English Dataset

dcterms:creator: Deepthi Mave
Suraj Maharjan
Thamar Solorio
dcterms:description: A dataset for language identification in code-switched data, specifically Hindi-English, containing Twitter and Facebook posts, introduced by Mave et al. in 2018.
dcterms:title: Hindi-English Dataset

dcterms:creator: Kushagra Singh
Indira Sen
Ponnurangam Kumaraguru
dcterms:description: A Twitter corpus for Hindi-English code-mixed part-of-speech tagging, containing tweets annotated with POS tags.
dcterms:title: Hindi-English POS Tagging Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset for named entity recognition on code-switched data, specifically Spanish-English, introduced at the CALCS 2018 workshop.
dcterms:title: Spanish-English NER Dataset
